LenovoProcessor.description: This is the schema definition for Oem Lenovo Processor resource.  It represents the properties of a processor attached to a System.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CacheInfo.longDescription: This property shall indicate the attibutes of processor cache device. Processoy may have different level cache.

CurrentClockSpeedMHz.description: The current speed (in MHz) of this Processor.
CurrentClockSpeedMHz.longDescription: The current speed (in MHz) of this Processor.

ExternalBusClockSpeedMHz.description: The speed (in MHz) of the external bus interface.
ExternalBusClockSpeedMHz.longDescription: The speed (in MHz) of the external bus interface.

NumberOfEnabledCores.description: Number of processor cores enabled for processor.
NumberOfEnabledCores.longDescription: Number of processor cores enabled for processor.

ProcessorFamily.description: The Family field for this processor.
ProcessorFamily.longDescription: This property shall indicate the Processor Family field.

ProcessorCache.description: This includes the processor cache information
ProcessorCache.longDescription: This type shall contain cache of a processor resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CacheLevel.description: This includes the processor cache information

InstalledSizeKByte.description: The installed cache size. The value should be zero if no cache is installed.

MaxCacheSizeKByte.description: The maximum size that can be installed.

title: #LenovoProcessor.v1_0_0
